list.en: Which season do you like the most?
How are the springs in your city?
list.cn: 你们城市的泉水怎么样?

list.en: I like spring.
Seeds germinate in the spring.
The old tree sprouted in this spring.
list.cn: 这棵老树在今年春天发芽了。

list.en: The spring thaw caused the river to deluge the region.
list.cn: 春天的解冻使河水淹没了这个地区。

list.en: Flowers disclose their colors in spring.
We write poems every spring.
It's windy in spring in Beijing.
In spring, the Ice flows break up.
Is it windy and dusty in spring?
Spring came late this year.
Spring comes after the severe winter.
Buds appear on the trees in spring.
It's quite windy in spring in my hometown.
Spring is the early part of the year.
Flowers bloom in springtime.
Spring is a beautiful season.
list.cn: 春天是一个美丽的季节。

list.en: Many flowers bloom in the spring.
It's warm today.
Here comes the summer.
Summer begins.
We had a terribly hot summer this year.
It is very dry in summer in my hometown.
I swim every day during the summer.
What do you associate with summer?
We've had quantities of rain this summer.
list.cn: 今年夏天我们下了很多雨。

list.en: The beach swarms with people in summer.
The weather is hot in the summer.
What do you like to do in the summer?
I don't like summer so much.
We tour by car every summer.
list.cn: 我们每年夏天开车旅游。

list.en: We'll spend holiday in China this summer.
list.cn: 今年夏天我们将在中国度假。

list.en: Where do you plan to go this summer?
list.cn: 今年夏天你打算去哪里?

list.en: Of all the seasons, summer is the hottest.
list.cn: 在所有的季节里，夏天是最热的。

list.en: In summer hotels here are fully booked every day.
list.cn: 夏天的时候，这里的旅馆每天都订满了。

list.en: This summer seems to be a little cooler than last summer.
list.cn: 今年夏天似乎比去年夏天凉爽一点。

list.en: Leaves turn yellow in autumn.
Leaves fall off the trees in the autumn.
list.cn: 秋天树叶从树上掉下来。

list.en: Why do you like running in the autumn?
list.cn: 你为什么喜欢在秋天跑步?

list.en: Autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.
list.cn: 秋天是一年中最美丽的季节。

list.en: I feel a little cool in the autumn null night.
list.cn: 秋天的夜晚，我感到有点凉爽。

list.en: There is a breath of autumn in the air today.
list.cn: 今天的空气中弥漫着秋天的气息。

list.en: The weather in september was positively autumnal.
list.cn: 九月的天气完全是秋天的天气。

list.en: I like to collect russet autumn leaves.
list.cn: 我喜欢收集赤褐色的秋叶。

list.en: These flowers seed in autumn.
I enjoy the pleasantly cool autumn days.
list.cn: 我喜欢凉爽宜人的秋日。

list.en: Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
list.cn: 秋天是羊毛市场活跃的季节。

list.en: Autumn is the best season for traveling.
list.cn: 秋天是最好的旅游季节。

list.en: We have an abundant harvest.
Autumn is the harvest season.
The autumn sky is really nice and clear.
The autumn leaves are very wonderful.
The trees were naked during winter.
This pond often freezes in winter.
The plum trees come into blossom in winter.
It always snows in winter.
Winter will go soon.
Flowers are scarce in winter.
Snow indicates the coming of winter.
list.cn: 下雪预示着冬天的来临。

list.en: These flowers don't perish in winter.
list.cn: 这些花在冬天不会凋谢。

list.en: I always feel tired in winter.
If winter comes, can spring be far behind?
list.cn: 冬天来了，春天还会远吗?

list.en: Personally, I prefer winter weather.
list.cn: 就我个人而言，我更喜欢冬天。

list.en: Many people wear furs in winter.
It is freezing.
I'm chill, bland.
It is really piercing cold.
The cold weather has set in.
I put on my winter boots.
These flowers may die in winter.
list.cn: 这些花在冬天可能会枯死。

list.en: Bears usually hibernate in their dens in winter.
list.cn: 熊冬天通常在洞里冬眠。

list.en: Do you think it will be sunny at the weekend?
list.cn: 你认为周末会是晴天吗?

list.en: It's clearing up.
It's going to be fine tomorrow.
It seems to be clearing up.
I hope it will keep fine.
I hope the weather stays this way.
list.cn: 我希望天气能一直这样下去。

list.en: It's a fine day today.
There isn't a cloud in the sky.
Lovely weather, isn't it?
What a fine day.
The sun is shining.
Today is a nice day.
It's nice and bright.
The sky is clear and bright without a speck of cloud.
list.cn: 天空晴朗明亮，没有一丝云。

list.en: What a sunny day.
There was no cloud in the sky.
A typhoon is coming.
Wind is blowing outside.
The wind screamed through the woods.
The wind has pricked up.
The wind blows from east.
Wind belly the sails.
The wind jarred the Windows.
The water rippled.
The wind has stopped.
The wind is very strong.
It is windy today.
It blew hard.
There is no wind.
It is hard to walk because of the strong wind.
list.cn: 因为风很大，走路很困难。

list.en: The wind is dying down.
It looks as if it is going to rain.
The rain is settling in.
I don't think the rain would last long.
Has the rain stopped?
Is it raining outside?
It's raining hard.
It's raining cats and dogs.
It has been raining hard all day long.
It rained suddenly in the afternoon.
It is the rainy season.
There was lightning and thunder last night.
It is a heavy rain.
I got wet in the rain.
It begins to rain.
She was drenched through with rain.
It rains practically all night.
Dark clouds, so no rain.
The rain has cooled the air.
The day was drizzling.
It settled in to rain and lasted all morning.
list.cn: 天开始下起雨来，一直下了一上午。

list.en: The rain stopped and the sun began to shine again.
The weather forecast says it's going to rain tomorrow.
list.cn: 天气预报说明天要下雨。

list.en: It started drizzling.
There will be a thundershower tomorrow.
Do you like the soft touch of snowflakes on your face?
list.cn: 你喜欢雪花在你脸上的柔软触感吗?

list.en: We shoveled a path through the snow.
list.cn: 我们在雪地里铲出一条路。

list.en: I squashed home on the snow ground.
The snow hampered my movements.
The snow began about midnight.
I bet that it will snow tomorrow.
It is snowing.
It's not unlikely to snow tomorrow.
list.cn: 明天下雪的可能性不大。

list.en: According to the weather report, it's going to snow.
list.cn: 根据天气预报，要下雪了。

list.en: It snowed heavily.
It snows.
I was stuck in snow.
The snow has melted.
I made a snowman.
Snowflakes are dancing in the air.
Snowflakes were padding against the window pane.
